channel.description: Week 4 Announcements This Week Mon: Lab 3 Due 7 PM Mon: Week 3 Discussion 11:59 PM Fri: Week 4 Quizzes Next Tues: Lab 4 Next Tues: No Discussion Lab 3 Grading Remote (RDP & SSH) Static IP on Ubuntu DNS Server Settings DNS Lookups DHCP Settings SNMP & Wireshark Pics Success Read Carefully See Posted Hints Use Resources Ask Questions Don't "Spin Your Wheels" Speaker: Beocat Admin Kyle Hutson Manage K-State's Supercomputer Experience with Powerful Hardware Cloud vs. On Prem Scientific Computing Lab 4 Windows Server VM Active Directory OpenLDAP Configure Clients Configure Interop MAKE SNAPSHOTS Lab 5 Create Cloud Resources SSH Config & Firewall Apache Virtual Hosts Docker Setup Reverse Proxy Keep in Touch!
